name: Hoppy Frog
description:
Survive and eat all the bees you can!

First-time participating in a game jam. I had a blast!

I used Godot for the first time and I'm happy with the product

The main character is a frog for the theme, I knew I wanted to have a tongue mechanic, for only one level I had the player stay on one level where the platforms come down. I used the bees as the main score mechanic to mix things up a bit.

The game concept and use of the limitation is somewhat basic but it is my first jam so I wanted to take it easy. 

Sound might be laggy on webGL, it's fine on windows build

- DIFFICULTIES -

Easy - Slow-moving platforms, a bigger jump

Normal - How the game should be played. Set difficulty

Hard - The same as normal with scaling difficulty

- CREDITS -

Developers - Me (Izacc)

Pixel Art Fonts! (Premium Pack) - Pixel Overload

Super Platform Maker - GhostWolf

Bat Assets - erin.silva

Mouse Pointer - Freepik
